TopicTitle: Is there a mod that allows you to swap characters/textures?

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I want to get some video of some engineer/scientist kerbals on the launchpad or runway or around other areas of the spaceport conducting experiments with engine parts. Is there a mod that will let me swap the kerbal models and use one of the non astronaut kerbals so I can move and position them in game?

Thanks!
Universe re placer is your best bet.
Any idea how to go about that? I see others have colored the astronaut suits, but don't see where people have replaced the models? Not familiar with UR, but will download it tonight. Thanks.

That mod is for textures only. Swapping out models will be difficult I guess, because of the associated animations.. And I guess nobody knows how too find the other models, like the scientist and the engineer, but again most like they do not contain the same animations, and thus cannot be swapped.
